en.title: QP Wearers, Filipino Basketball Stars, Allan Caidic & Samboy Lim!
en.content:
Former PBA Stars -Allan Caidic and Samboy Lim are both household names in the Philippines. Allan is considered the greatest outside shooter the country has ever produced, earning the moniker " The Triggerman". Allan was also voted as one of the 25 greatest PBA players to ever play the game ( Samboy Lim is among the 25 ). 

Samboy is such an aerial artist in basketball that he is known as the 
" Skywalker " of the Philippines. 
( Michael Jordan is the original Skywalker ). 

Samboy has great testimonials of FE's QP , especially of his 74 years old nanay ( grandmother).
